definition: a variety of the card game bridge in which the bidder receives points only for the number of tricks that have been bid, to be stricken by or fall victim to an illness
details:
noun
- a variety of the card game bridge in which the bidder receives points only for the number of tricks that have been bid
= example: a variety of the card game bridge in which the bidder receives points only for the number of tricks that have been bid
= synonyms: contract bridge
- a binding agreement between two or more persons that is enforceable by law
= example: a binding agreement between two or more persons that is enforceable by law
- in bridge, the highest bid, which sets the number of tricks that the bidder must make
= example: in bridge, the highest bid, which sets the number of tricks that the bidder must make
= synonyms: declaration
- an order to kill someone, usually for money
= example: an order to kill someone, usually for money
verb
- to be stricken by or fall victim to an illness
= example: to be stricken by or fall victim to an illness
= synonyms: get, take
- to become smaller or draw together
= example: to become smaller or draw together
= synonyms: shrink
- to reduce in scope while retaining essential elements
= example: to reduce in scope while retaining essential elements
= synonyms: cut, reduce, shorten, abridge, abbreviate, foreshorten
- to make or become more narrow or restricted
= synonyms: narrow
- to enter into a contractual arrangement
= synonyms: undertake
- to make smaller
= example: to make smaller
= synonyms: decrease
- to squeeze or press together
= synonyms: press
- to engage by written agreement
= synonyms: sign, sign up, sign on
